nodes.text: The Governor's Mansion was the residence of Barnab Chistor, a Human male who served as the governor of the city Hedrett during the latter years of the Galactic Republic. In around 31 BBY, the Heroes of Cularin—a group of freelance agents who operated within the Cularin system—assisted in the liberating the Blue Star Centre after it was held hostage by the Intarsa League criminal faction. To thank them for their efforts, Chistor invited the agents to a formal dinner at the Governor's Mansion.
